rbr.description: The most classic rally simulation game, Rally Sim Fans version.

tooltip.playPacenotesWhenReplaying: Play the pacenotes during replaying finished races.
tooltip.additional_pacenote_def: Pacenote definition db file, contains mapping from rbr pacenote to ztmz pacenote definitions.
tooltip.autoSwitchPacenoteDef: When detected the current track is using the default RBR pacenote, use the default pacenote definition, otherwise, use the definitions in the above pacenote definition file.

message.custom_pacenote_not_used: Default pacenote is used for current track {0}. It's ok, but Luppis V3 pacenote is recommended. It's also possible that Luppis V3 pacenote doesn't contain the pacenote script for the current track.
